title: Im on LEAVER BUSTERS FOR NO REASON!
body:
Hey before i get into what im gonna say ill just tell you my gamertag: PS Killz

Okay so right now im on a 20 minute leaver buster. First i was on a 5 minute i got put on the 5 minute because my computer when black on 2 games and just crashed so every body remaked that happened to me 3 times so the first time it happened i got 5 minute waiter but i said "aww its only 5 minutes its not that bad" Then it happened again and i got put on 10 minute waiter and i said "WTF IS THIS WHY DID I GET PUT ON A LEAVER FOR A BLACK SCREEN ITS NOT LIKE IM TRYING TO NOT PLAY OR SOMETHING" pretty mad on tilt and now its happened again and im on a 20 minute   im thinking "OMFG NO WAY 20 MINUTES FOR NOTHING WHAT DID I DO TO DESERVE THIS" but mind you my laptop top is pretty ancient so i could see why it would do that but i just love playing League Of Legends so i try play on this old thing anyways because it works most times so Please can you help and take these waiters away I really carnt be bothered waiting especially when i didnt do anything to deserve it! THANK YOU 
- PS Killz

replies.body:
i got a 20 minute one after one time cause my computer decided to start updating (come on windows ten!) and i get rewarded with 20 minute queues for 5 games.

mind you that was my first afk in 5 months (and all my afk's aren't purposeful)

How many games have you played in that time though?

I play so many games I can AFK my next 20 and not get Leaver Busted.
A friend of mine however got Leaver Busted for one game, because it was his first match in about a year.

Leaver Buster acts on a percentage of your current games.
haven't played in first 2-3 months of that period, then SPAM PLAYED EVERY DAY FOR LEVEL 30

Oh well there's your problem.

Less than level 30 and fresh level 30 players have tighter restrictions than anyone else.

Hey summoner,

As I understand you AFKed/crashed 4 times (correct me if I'm wrong);

+ Twice to get your initial 5 minute low priority queue.

+ Another time to get your 10 minute low priority queue.

+ A final time to receive a 20 minute low priority queue.

The LeaverBuster system allows for rare events like PC crashes, that's why you didn't get punished the first few times. But it begins to punish players when this behaviour becomes too frequent, like when it happened 4 times in a short period of time.

I know it wasn't intentional, but you're still wasting people's time when you crash. Even if the game ends in a remake, you've still wasted close to 10 minutes of everyone's time (including time spent in champion select etc.)

You **knew** that there was a clear issue with your PC by the 2nd crash yet you continued to play instead of fixing the issue. Even though your PC crashing isn't you fault, your choice to continue to play is your fault.

__*

What you should have done is contact **Riot** or one of the board members about your issues. It's unlikely your punishments will be reversed, but we're definitely able to help you fix your problem! :D

+ [Here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/sections/200383134-Hardware-Software)'s some troubleshooting posts that you might find handy. 

+ You can also contact [**Riot** Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) directly (they'll probably ask you to try the general trouble shooting tips first though).

+ Or if you're looking for a faster response, you could also make a post detailing your issue in the [Help & Support board](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/f/ElA0rvVL).

I know this is quite an unfortunate experience for you, but hopefully we can get you back up and running soon without any crashes ;)
Ok I understand it is my fault i decided to still play so ill take responsibility. And thanks ill make sure to look into it

No worries, remember we're always here to help if you need it.

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
